product_name: Swiss Army Climber Knife with Pouch
long_description: The Swiss Army Climber knife with pouch is a compact pocket knife with a selection of 10 useful tools. Features a small blade and a large blade. Includes can/bottle opener, 2 screwdrivers, wire stripper, scissors, reamer with sewing eye, corkscrew, hook, toothpick, tweezers and lanyard ring. Comes with a rugged pouch with belt loop. Precision-crafted by Swiss Army of Switzerland; steel maintains its edge and strength.
short_description: The Swiss Army Climber knife with pouch is a compact pocket knife with a selection of 10 useful tools.
